Name: ALEON's Nightmare
About the game: Aleon is a young girl who is looking for a job. One day she found a job but things didn’t go well as she wishes. You have to find out the odd things happening in the mysterious house and You need to survive in the middle of psychopath puppets. Use the tools you find around. And remember… You are in the middle of nightmare. You are at the end of nowhere where fear reigns. No One knows what is happening there. You have no choice for a new job. The old man needs help. Be nice to him. But you should be careful. Some Things happen there that the old man can’t figure out. It is quite unpredictable what will happen when. Do you brave enough to survive? Features: Game: A walking simulation where you solve puzzles by interacting with surrounding objects. Immersive look: Soft lights of sections, dark corners, and colorful images are waiting for you. Stealth: Get over the creatures by hiding from them. Psigolocigal Horror: The unexpectable creature will horrify you. Unchasable enemies: It's hard to predict when enemies will do what. AutoSave: The game has autosave.
